sentences.en: a man with a northern accent
Any day now, the Northern forces may pour across the new border.
sentences.cn: 北方的军队现在随时都可能大批越过新边界。

sentences.en: Austrian wine styles are often bracketed with those of northern Germany.
sentences.cn: 人们往往把奥地利葡萄酒的风味与德国北部葡萄酒的风味相提并论。

sentences.en: Both Scotland and Northern Ireland had made last-minute substitutions.
sentences.cn: 苏格兰队和北爱尔兰队都在最后时刻做了换人调整。

sentences.en: He turned up in northern Cyprus, declaring himself happy to be home.
sentences.cn: 他出现在塞浦路斯北部，声称自己很高兴又回家了。

sentences.en: His cooking reflects a determination to acknowledge his northern roots.
sentences.cn: 他的烹饪风格表明他决心承认自己根在北方的坚定决心。
北爱尔兰队将对阵拉脱维亚队。

sentences.en: Northern Kentucky is likely to get snow mixed with sleet.
sentences.cn: 肯塔基州北部可能有雨夹雪。

sentences.en: Prices at three-star hotels fell furthest in several northern cities.
sentences.cn: 3星级宾馆的住宿价格在几个北方城市降得最多。

sentences.en: The boat was anchored off the northern coast of the peninsula.
sentences.cn: 这艘船停泊在离该半岛北部海岸不远的地方。

sentences.en: The film takes no position on the politics of Northern Ireland.
sentences.cn: 这部电影未在北爱尔兰政治问题上选择站边。

sentences.en: There were, oddly, few other Britons living in this northern part.
sentences.cn: 说来也怪，很少有其他英国人住在这一北部地区。

sentences.en: These incidents suggest the peace in Northern Ireland is still brittle.
sentences.cn: 这些事件表明北爱尔兰的和平仍然很脆弱。

sentences.en: Tropical colours may look rather harsh in our dull northern light.
sentences.cn: 热带色彩在我们北方暗淡的光线下可能显得有点刺目。

sentences.en: Unemployment in Northern Ireland is twice the national average.
sentences.cn: 北爱尔兰的失业率是全国平均水平的两倍。

sentences.en: We are not yet fully resourced in Northern Ireland.
sentences.cn: 我们在北爱尔兰目前资源不足。

words.tran_cn: 北方的，向北的；来自北方的

phrases.tran_cn: 北爱尔兰自治区（在爱尔兰东北部）
北坡（美国阿拉斯加州北冰洋之间）
北领地，北部领地；北部地方

trans.tran_cn: 北方的，北部的，来自北方的，北风
trans.tran_en: in or from the north of a country or area
